title: ANDALaip-pOl
sahitya:
ANDALaip-pOl unai vENDi maiyal koNDEn azhagiya maNavALanE shrI rangarAjA


anupallavi

  nINDa kanavinilum ninra nanavinilum nIlamaNi vaNNA nin kOlam enat-tazhuva


caraNam    sOrum paruguginra nIrum shuTrilam kANum pArum ennuyir nilai vErum paramAtmA nI
mArum piravi kaDaittErum marundu nIyE mAdhavA gOvindA yAdavar singamE
